title: free coaching !
body:
hey guys im burstfire. ive been coaching for about 5 years. im currently offering a free coaching session to new students. 

if youre interested reply here or message me on discord: burstfire#8072

replies.body:
> . ive been coaching for about 5 years. im currently offering a free coaching session to new students. 

You've spent 5 years at home playing league without an actual income. Just drop the charade and get a job dude. Before you are too old and your resume look like a kid fresh out of school without experience.
It's nice of you to do, but you're Gold 4 with a negative winrate with 152 games. There's not much you can really teach people lol.
